articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: Perspective | The U.S. women's soccer team has teetered in these Olympics. In the shootout, it didn't flinch. - The Washington Post
articles.description: In the shootout, the Americans cast aside what plagued them over 120 minutes — attacking lulls and defensive hiccups — and displayed the steely resolve that has helped define the most decorated team in the women’s game.
